bibl.title: The Textual Criticism of Documentary Papyri. Prolegomena. Second edition.

series.title: University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No.

bibl.seg: Youtie Herbert C., The Textual Criticism of Documentary Papyri. Prolegomena. Second edition. (University of London. Institute of Classical Studies. Bulletin Supplement No. 33.)
London, Institute of Classical Studies, 1974, 4°, ix-69 pp. et XIV pll.

C.R. par Bernard Boyaval, REG 88 (1975) pp. 345-346. - Hélène Cadell, RPhil 3e s., 51 (1977) pp. 108-109. - Juan Pegueroles, StPap 14 (1975) pp. 151-152. - J. David Thomas, CR N.S., 27 (1977) p. 147. - Marcia E. Weinstein, CP 71 (1976) pp. 364-365.
